name: Neon Dimension
description:
Welcome to Neon Dimension!
Play an old-school arcade game with a modern design, in which you will enjoy exciting visual effects and excellent physics. And the relaxing gameplay is so easy to learn that you'll understand the whole idea after a few tries!
In the game space there are colorful neon blocks that need to be destroyed with a plasma ball. The ball continuously moves and bounces off the boundaries of the room and blocks. The player loses one life when the ball hits the bottom of the screen; to prevent this, the player has a movable racket with which the ball can be thrown back into the playing field. To complete the level, you need to completely clear the space from the blocks. Also in the game there are various bonuses that affect the gameplay.
Do you have a lot of free time, and are you bored? – What are you waiting for?" Start the game and enjoy a variety of challenges, in the game you will find 99 different levels!
